existing_features.title: Create a responsive multi-page business website branded with the name “Krishna Sunar” that showcases many product sectors, including (at minimum) Cars, Shoes, Pants, Belts, Bikes, and Bicycles, plus several additional sectors of your choice.

Implement a product catalog experience where each product displays: name, sector/category, price, advantages, and disadvantages; include a product detail view and a sector listing view with basic search and filtering by sector.
Add an About/Contact section/page that displays the owner details exactly as provided: name “Krishna sunar”, email “bkk449433@gmail.com”, address “jaimini 2 damek baglung”.

Establish a coherent visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) appropriate for a modern business catalog site and apply it consistently across all pages; avoid using a blue/purple primary palette.
Add and render generated static image assets (hero/banner and logo) stored under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the homepage and header.
Generate a new static background image asset and add it under `frontend/public/assets/generated`.
Apply the new background image as a site-wide background (all routes/pages), ensuring content remains readable in both light and dark modes.

Redesign the existing site UI into a hyper-modern personal portfolio for Krishna Sunar using a 'Cyber‑Minimalism' aesthetic: deep obsidian base, glowing neon sapphire accents, glassmorphism surfaces, and consistent premium typography and spacing across all routes.

Replace the current homepage hero with an interactive 3D hero: a large particle sphere rendered with Three.js (React Three Fiber) that reacts to mouse movement, with bold floating kinetic typography reading 'Krishna Sunar'.

Create a Biography 'scrollytelling' section that narrates Krishna Sunar’s journey from 'Jaimini 2, Damek, Baglung' and education at 'Shree Shanti Secondary School', with fade-in text and glassmorphism blur effects tied to scroll progress.
Implement a 'Skills Hub' section as an animated bento-box grid featuring glowing icons/marks and labels for: React.js, Python, Three.js, Tailwind CSS, and Cloud Architecture.
Add a site-wide motion system: liquid-smooth inertial scrolling feel, magnetic button hover interactions, and cinematic page transitions between routes.

Integrate the user’s uploaded images into the portfolio and remove any end-page attribution/branding text referencing 'caffeine.ai' or 'created by caffeine.ai'. Specifically, use IMG_20251129_100401.jpg and IMG_20251129_100401-1.jpg in appropriate portfolio sections (e.g., portrait/about/media area) as static assets served from the frontend.

Add a reusable portfolio video gallery component that renders a responsive grid of HTML5 videos sourced from static files under the frontend public assets (e.g., `/assets/videos/...`) and matches the existing Cyber‑Minimalism glassmorphism styling.

Integrate the new video gallery into the existing site UI by adding a 'Videos' section on the About page (below the existing MediaPortraits section) with an English section heading and short descriptive text consistent with the current typography.
Ensure video loading and playback are performance-aware: do not autoplay, support poster thumbnails when provided, and avoid layout shifts by reserving aspect-ratio space in the UI cards.
